course.title: Tumor Pathophysiology and Transport Phenomena - A Systems Biology Approach
course.description: Tumor pathophysiology plays a central role in the growth, metastasis, detection, and treatment of solid tumors. Principles of transport phenomena are applied to develop a quantitative understanding of tumor biology and treatment.
course.notes: Expected to be given in 2015-2016. Given alternate years with Cell Biology 212. Offered jointly with the Medical School as CB 704.0.
